jOS Help
--------

In the line above, you can see information about the system.
In the line below, you can type in commands.

Commands are always:
COMMAND ARGUMENT1 ARGUMENT2 ARGUMENT3 ...

Just seperate the command and the arguments with spaces and press [ENTER].
If you press [ENTER], the command will execute, with the arguments you entered.

For a list of avaible commands, use 'cmd' or 'commands'.
